entities.name: the dark arts
entities.description: Mr. Crouch despises and detests the Dark Arts and those who practice them.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: A Ministry of Magic employee who accuses Amos Diggory's daughter of practicing the Dark Arts.

entities.name: amos diggory
entities.description: A Ministry of Magic employee who is accused by Mr. Crouch of having a connection to the Dark Arts.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: An elf who finds Harry's wand in the trees and is questioned by Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: A Ministry of Magic employee who defends Winky and suggests that she might have picked up conjuring skills anywhere.

entities.name: harry's wand
entities.description: A wand found by Winky in the trees.

entities.name: the trees
entities.description: The location where Harry's wand was found.

relationships.description: Mr. Crouch accuses Amos Diggory of having a connection to the Dark Arts.
Mr. Weasley questions Winky about finding Harry's wand in the trees.
